name: PixelFem #22 - Yayoi Kusama
description:
Kusama is well-known for her use of dense patterns of polka dots and nets in her art and immersive installations. Born in Japan in 1929, Kusama came to the United States in 1957 and quickly found herself at the epicentre of the New York avant-garde. After achieving fame through ground-breaking exhibitions and art “happenings” she returned to her native country in 1973 and is now one of Japan’s most prominent contemporary artists.

✺This work is part of PixelFems, an evolving project on the Tezos blockchain celebrating iconic women from the past and present✺
